bug.author: psinger
bug.description:
Hi, I have image files that fail with the following error:
contains_unichar_id(unichar_id):Error:Assert failed:in file ../ccutil/unicharset.h, line 513 Segmentation fault (core dumped)
I am running it with
-l deu -c preserve_interword_spaces=1 -psm 3
I know that similar questions have been asked, but I have not seen an applicable solution yet. I tried different languages, which did not help. <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
Tesseract Version: v4.00.00alpha Platform: Ubuntu 64bit

comments.comment:
I know that similar questions have been asked, but I have not seen an applicable solution yet.
Please do not open a new issue when there is already a similar open issue. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/issues?q=is%3Aissue+%22contains_unichar_id%28unichar_id%22+is%3Aopen>https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/issues?q=is%3Aissue+%22contains_unichar_id%28unichar_id%22+is%3Aopen</denchmark-link>
This is a duplicate of issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/issues/1205>#1205</denchmark-link> .
